name: DREAMSPACE
description:
Enter the DREAM REALM in DREAMSPACE!

STORY

In DREAMSPACE, a prophecy is set to occur many years into the future... But what happens when the prophetic Hero arrives early?

GAMEPLAY

DREAMSPACE is a turn-based RPG with low poly graphics along with pixel art reminiscent of a PSX game! Battles happen from a front-view perspective, with a timed attack system similar to a rhythm game!

OTHER..?

No matter what, I hope you can enjoy the game :D
